# n8n_execution_retry (Resource)

Retries a failed n8n workflow execution. This resource triggers a retry operation and captures the resulting execution details.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Required

- `execution_id` (String) ID of the execution to retry

### Read-Only

- `finished` (Boolean) Whether the retried execution finished
- `mode` (String) Execution mode
- `new_execution_id` (String) ID of the new execution created by the retry
- `started_at` (String) Timestamp when the retried execution started
- `status` (String) Status of the retried execution
- `stopped_at` (String) Timestamp when the retried execution stopped
- `workflow_id` (String) ID of the workflow that was executed
